header.name: chaos/preprocessor/algorithm/auto/for_each_product.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines an algorithm that repeats a user-specified target for each Cartesian product of elements in a of .

macro.abstract: The macro repeats the target specified by its first argument for each Cartesian product of elements in its second argument.

usage.param:
The target that is to be repeated for each Cartesian product in seq. This target must be either a or a macro name that refers to a macro with a signature compatible with the following pseudo-signature:
macro(s, product)
